JACT Auditions

JACT auditions will be held Saturday, May 18, 2019.

Auditions for all shows will consist of cold reads from the script.

Everyone auditioning for the musical Let Your Hair Down, Rapunzel should be prepared to sing 32 bars of any style song to be sung a capella or with CD/Phone accompaniast. There will be no live accompaniast.

Please complete the on line audition application and email to tstew@applehillplayhouse.org You will have an opportunity to select an audition time preference.
